trans-unit.source: Identifies a cell in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Identifica una celda de la cuadrícula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> can be used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to get or set the value of any cell.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> puede utilizarse junto con la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> del control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> propiedad para obtener o establecer el valor de una celda.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> causes the focus to move to the cell specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.
trans-unit.target: Establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> del control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> propiedad a una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> hace que el enfoque se mueva a la celda especificada por el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> and returns the column and row number of the selected cell.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se asigna el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> de un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> y devuelve el número de fila y columna de la celda seleccionada.

trans-unit.source: The value stored in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is also printed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El valor almacenado en el <xref:System.Data.DataTable> también se imprime con la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> del objeto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The number of a row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: Número de fila en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of a column in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: Número de columna en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> and sets the new instance to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> y establece la nueva instancia en la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> de un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of a column in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el número de una columna del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of the column.
trans-unit.target: Número de la columna.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> valor que se especifica un <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> en el <xref:System.Data.DataTable> asociados con el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se asigna el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> a una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.

trans-unit.source: The value stored in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is returned by specifying <xref:System.Data.DataRow> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: El valor almacenado en el <xref:System.Data.DataTable> se devuelve mediante la especificación de <xref:System.Data.DataRow> y <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objetos a través de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> propiedades.

trans-unit.source: An object you are to comparing.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto que se va a comparar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> is identical to a second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> es idéntico a un segundo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the second object is identical to the first; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el segundo objeto es idéntico al primero; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example compares two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> objects.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se comparan dos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash value that can be added to a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor hash que puede agregarse a un <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />.

trans-unit.source: A number that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> in a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />.
trans-unit.target: Un número que identifica de forma única <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> en <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example adds the hash value of the selected cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control to a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se agrega el valor hash de la celda seleccionada en un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> el control a un <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of a row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el número de una fila del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row.
trans-unit.target: Número de la fila.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> valor que se especifica un <xref:System.Data.DataRow> en el <xref:System.Data.DataTable> asociados con el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> and returns the value stored in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se asigna el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> a una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> y devuelve el valor almacenado en el <xref:System.Data.DataTable> del objeto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> propiedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row number and column number of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el número de fila y el número de columna de la celda.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the row number and column number.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que contiene el número de fila y el número de columna.

trans-unit.source: The following example returns the row number of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se devuelve el número de fila de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> del control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> mediante la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> del objeto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ToString%2A> método.
